import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap"; import { Card, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; const Product = ({ bike }) => { return ( {bike.name}
{bike.price} $
 ) } export default Product
